attributes.action: Make criminal convictions not form a part of risk for motor insurance
attributes.additional_details: It does not help with rehabilitation not being able to obtain insurance due to a non driving related criminal conviction
attributes.background: Consider having it not to be allowed to have a impact on motor insurance having a unspent non driving criminal conviction

rejection.details:
Petitions must call for a specific action that the UK Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about what factors to take into account when offering motor insurance are a matter for individual insurance companies, not the Government or Parliament.

As a result it is not possible for the Government or Parliament to take the action you have requested.
